services:
  claude_bot:
    image: kroschu/claude-code-telegram:1.0.4-standalone-fixed
    container_name: claude-code-bot
    restart: unless-stopped
    env_file:
      - .env
    volumes:
      - ./data:/app/data
      # Optional: Mount the Claude CLI authentication directory from the host
      # Uncomment if you want to use existing host Claude CLI authentication
      # For Linux/macOS: ~/.claude
      # For Windows: ${USERPROFILE}/.claude
      # - ~/.claude:/home/claudebot/.claude  # Standalone mode - no mounting needed
      - ./target_project:/app/target_project  # ‚úÖ New volume for target project
    working_dir: /app
    user: "1000:1000"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "python", "-c", "import sys; sys.exit(0) if __import__('src.main') else sys.exit(1)"]
      interval: 60s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 30s
    logging:
      driver: "json-file"
      options:
        max-size: "10m"
        max-file: "3"

volumes:
  data:

# Production-ready Dockerfile for Claude Telegram Bot
# Built for remote server deployment with user: kroschu
# Image: kroschu/claude-code-telegram:latest

FROM python:3.11-slim

# Build arguments for flexibility
ARG USER_UID=1000
ARG USER_GID=1000
ARG USERNAME=claudebot

# Install system dependencies including Node.js for Claude CLI
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    curl \
    git \
    jq \
    gcc \
    g++ \
    ca-certificates \
    gnupg \
    && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg \
    && echo "deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg] https://deb.nodesource.com/node_20.x nodistro main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nodesource.list \
    && apt-get update \
    && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends nodejs \
    && apt-get clean \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
    && rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/*

# Create non-root user with consistent UID/GID for volume mounting
RUN groupadd -g ${USER_GID} ${USERNAME} \
    && useradd -m -u ${USER_UID} -g ${USER_GID} -s /bin/bash ${USERNAME}

# Create application and data directories with proper ownership
RUN mkdir -p /app/data /app/target_project \
    && chown -R ${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} /app

# Set environment variables
ENV HOME=/home/${USERNAME}
ENV PATH="/home/${USERNAME}/.local/bin:$PATH"
ENV PYTHONPATH=/app
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
ENV PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1
ENV TZ=Europe/Kiev

# Switch to non-root user
USER ${USERNAME}
WORKDIR /home/${USERNAME}

# Install Poetry
RUN curl -sSL https://install.python-poetry.org | python3 -
ENV PATH="/home/${USERNAME}/.local/bin:${PATH}"

# Copy dependency files for Poetry
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} pyproject.toml poetry.lock README.md ./

# Configure Poetry and install Python dependencies
RUN poetry config virtualenvs.create false \
    && poetry config virtualenvs.in-project false \
    && poetry install --only=main --no-root --no-cache

# Install Claude CLI and create necessary directories
RUN mkdir -p ~/.local/bin ~/.claude/plugins/repos \
    && npm install @anthropic-ai/claude-code \
    && ln -s "$(pwd)/node_modules/.bin/claude" ~/.local/bin/claude

# Copy application code to /app
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} src/ /app/src/
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} CLAUDE.md /app/

# Set working directory to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Create simple entrypoint script (relies on mounted .claude directory)
RUN echo '#!/bin/bash\n\
# Create Claude CLI directory structure if not mounted\n\
mkdir -p ~/.claude/plugins/repos\n\
\n\
# Start the application\n\
exec python -m src.main "$@"\n' > /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh \
    && chmod +x /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh

# Health check with comprehensive validation
HEALTHCHECK --interval=60s --timeout=15s --start-period=45s --retries=3 \
    CMD python -c "try: import src.main; from src.config.settings import Settings; Settings(); print('‚úì Health check passed'); exit(0)\nexcept Exception as e: print(f'‚úó Health check failed: {e}'); exit(1)"

# Labels for container management
LABEL maintainer="kroschu" \
      version="1.0.4-standalone" \
      description="Claude Code Telegram Bot - Remote access to Claude CLI via Telegram" \
      org.label-schema.vcs-url="https://github.com/maxfraieho/claude-notifer-and-bot"

# Default command with authentication setup
ENTRYPOINT ["/home/claudebot/entrypoint.sh"]

1‚Üí"""Configuration management using Pydantic Settings.
     2‚Üí
     3‚ÜíFeatures:
     4‚Üí- Environment variable loading
     5‚Üí- Type validation
     6‚Üí- Default values
     7‚Üí- Computed properties
     8‚Üí- Environment-specific settings
     9‚Üí"""
    10‚Üí
    11‚Üífrom datetime import time
    12‚Üífrom pathlib import Path
    13‚Üífrom typing import Any, List, Optional
    14‚Üí
    15‚Üífrom pydantic import BaseModel, Field, SecretStr, field_validator, model_validator
    16‚Üífrom pydantic_settings import BaseSettings, SettingsConfigDict
    17‚Üí
    18‚Üífrom src.utils.constants import (
    19‚Üí    DEFAULT_CLAUDE_MAX_COST_PER_USER,
    20‚Üí    DEFAULT_CLAUDE_MAX_TURNS,
    21‚Üí    DEFAULT_CLAUDE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,
    22‚Üí    DEFAULT_DATABASE_URL,
    23‚Üí    DEFAULT_MAX_SESSIONS_PER_USER,
    24‚Üí    DEFAULT_RATE_LIMIT_BURST,
    25‚Üí    DEFAULT_RATE_LIMIT_REQUESTS,
    26‚Üí    DEFAULT_RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW,
    27‚Üí    DEFAULT_SESSION_TIMEOUT_HOURS,
    28‚Üí)
    29‚Üí
    30‚Üí
    31‚Üíclass ClaudeAvailabilitySettings(BaseModel):
    32‚Üí    """Settings for Claude CLI availability monitoring."""
    33‚Üí    
    34‚Üí    enabled: bool = Field(default=False, description="Whether Claude CLI availability monitoring is enabled")
    35‚Üí    check_interval_seconds: int = Field(default=60, description="Check interval in seconds")
    36‚Üí    notify_chat_ids: List[int] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Chat IDs to notify")
    37‚Üí    dnd_start: time = Field(default=time(23, 0), description="DND start time (Europe/Kyiv)")
    38‚Üí    dnd_end: time = Field(default=time(8, 0), description="DND end time (Europe/Kyiv)")

"""Configuration management using Pydantic Settings.

Features:
- Environment variable loading
- Type validation
- Default values
- Computed properties
- Environment-specific settings
"""

from datetime import time
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Any, List, Optional

from pydantic import BaseModel, Field, SecretStr, field_validator, model_validator
from pydantic_settings import BaseSettings, SettingsConfigDict

from src.utils.constants import (
    DEFAULT_CLAUDE_MAX_COST_PER_USER,
    DEFAULT_CLAUDE_MAX_TURNS,
    DEFAULT_CLAUDE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,
    DEFAULT_DATABASE_URL,
    DEFAULT_MAX_SESSIONS_PER_USER,
    DEFAULT_RATE_LIMIT_BURST,
    DEFAULT_RATE_LIMIT_REQUESTS,
    DEFAULT_RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW,
    DEFAULT_SESSION_TIMEOUT_HOURS,
)


class ClaudeAvailabilitySettings(BaseModel):
    """Settings for Claude CLI availability monitoring."""
    
    enabled: bool = Field(default=False, description="Whether Claude CLI availability monitoring is enabled")
    check_interval_seconds: int = Field(default=60, description="Check interval in seconds")
    notify_chat_ids: List[int] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Chat IDs to notify")
    dnd_start: time = Field(default=time(23, 0), description="DND start time (Europe/Kyiv)")
    dnd_end: time = Field(default=time(8, 0), description="DND end time (Europe/Kyiv)")
    debounce_ok_count: int = Field(default=2, description="Number of consecutive OK checks to confirm availability")


class Settings(BaseSettings):
    """Application settings loaded from environment variables."""

    # Bot settings
    telegram_bot_token: SecretStr = Field(
        ..., description="Telegram bot token from BotFather"
    )
    telegram_bot_username: str = Field(..., description="Bot username without @")

toolUseResult.originalFile:
# Production-ready Dockerfile for Claude Telegram Bot
# Built for remote server deployment with user: kroschu
# Image: kroschu/claude-code-telegram:latest

FROM python:3.11-slim

# Build arguments for flexibility
ARG USER_UID=1000
ARG USER_GID=1000
ARG USERNAME=claudebot

# Install system dependencies including Node.js for Claude CLI
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    curl \
    git \
    jq \
    gcc \
    g++ \
    ca-certificates \
    gnupg \
    && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg \
    && echo "deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg] https://deb.nodesource.com/node_20.x nodistro main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nodesource.list \
    && apt-get update \
    && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends nodejs \
    && apt-get clean \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
    && rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/*

# Create non-root user with consistent UID/GID for volume mounting
RUN groupadd -g ${USER_GID} ${USERNAME} \
    && useradd -m -u ${USER_UID} -g ${USER_GID} -s /bin/bash ${USERNAME}

# Create application and data directories with proper ownership
RUN mkdir -p /app/data /app/target_project \
    && chown -R ${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} /app

# Set environment variables
ENV HOME=/home/${USERNAME}
ENV PATH="/home/${USERNAME}/.local/bin:$PATH"
ENV PYTHONPATH=/app
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
ENV PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1
ENV TZ=Europe/Kiev

# Switch to non-root user
USER ${USERNAME}
WORKDIR /home/${USERNAME}

# Install Poetry
RUN curl -sSL https://install.python-poetry.org | python3 -
ENV PATH="/home/${USERNAME}/.local/bin:${PATH}"

# Copy dependency files for Poetry
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} pyproject.toml poetry.lock README.md ./

# Configure Poetry and install Python dependencies
RUN poetry config virtualenvs.create false \
    && poetry config virtualenvs.in-project false \
    && poetry install --only=main --no-root --no-cache

# Install Claude CLI and create necessary directories
RUN mkdir -p ~/.local/bin ~/.claude/plugins/repos \
    && npm install @anthropic-ai/claude-code \
    && ln -s "$(pwd)/node_modules/.bin/claude" ~/.local/bin/claude

# Copy application code to /app
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} src/ /app/src/
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} CLAUDE.md /app/

# Set working directory to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Create simple entrypoint script (relies on mounted .claude directory)
RUN echo '#!/bin/bash\n\
# Create Claude CLI directory structure if not mounted\n\
mkdir -p ~/.claude/plugins/repos\n\
\n\
# Start the application\n\
exec python -m src.main "$@"\n' > /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh \
    && chmod +x /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh

# Health check with comprehensive validation
HEALTHCHECK --interval=60s --timeout=15s --start-period=45s --retries=3 \
    CMD python -c "try: import src.main; from src.config.settings import Settings; Settings(); print('‚úì Health check passed'); exit(0)\nexcept Exception as e: print(f'‚úó Health check failed: {e}'); exit(1)"

# Labels for container management
LABEL maintainer="kroschu" \
      version="1.0.4-standalone" \
      description="Claude Code Telegram Bot - Remote access to Claude CLI via Telegram" \
      org.label-schema.vcs-url="https://github.com/maxfraieho/claude-notifer-and-bot"

# Default command with authentication setup
ENTRYPOINT ["/home/claudebot/entrypoint.sh"]

# üöÄ Quick Start - Claude Telegram Bot

## –ú–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–∏–π –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ (–≤—Å–µ –ø—Ä–∞—Ü—é—î –æ–¥—Ä–∞–∑—É!)

### 1. –ù–∞–ª–∞—à—Ç—É–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è `.env` —Ñ–∞–π–ª—É

```bash
cp .env.example .env
```

–í—ñ–¥—Ä–µ–¥–∞–≥—É–π—Ç–µ `.env` —Ñ–∞–π–ª:

```bash
# ===== –û–ë–û–í'–Ø–ó–ö–û–í–û =====
TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=your_actual_bot_token_here     # –¢–æ–∫–µ–Ω –≤—ñ–¥ @BotFather
TELEGRAM_BOT_USERNAME=your_bot_username           # –Ü–º'—è –±–æ—Ç–∞ –±–µ–∑ @

# ===== ANTHROPIC/CLAUDE =====
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=your_anthropic_api_key_here     # API –∫–ª—é—á –∑ claude.ai
CLAUDE_MODEL=claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022          # –ú–æ–¥–µ–ª—å Claude
USE_SDK=false                                     # false = CLI —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º (—Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–æ)

# ===== –ë–ï–ó–ü–ï–ö–ê =====
ALLOWED_USERS=123456789,987654321                # ID –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É–≤–∞—á—ñ–≤ Telegram
APPROVED_DIRECTORY=/app/target_project            # –î–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª–µ–Ω–∞ –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ—è
```

### 2. –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫

```bash
docker-compose up -d --build
```

**–í—Å–µ! –ë–æ—Ç –ø—Ä–∞—Ü—é—î –æ–¥—Ä–∞–∑—É –±–µ–∑ –¥–æ–¥atkowego –Ω–∞–ª–∞—à—Ç—É–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è.**

### 3. –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤—ñ—Ä–∫–∞

```bash

docker-compose logs -f claude_bot

# –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤—ñ—Ä–∏—Ç–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å
docker-compose ps
```

## üìã –©–æ –ø–æ—Ç—Ä—ñ–±–Ω–æ:

1. **Telegram Bot Token** - –æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º–∞—Ç–∏ –≤—ñ–¥ [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather)
2. **Anthropic API Key** - –æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º–∞—Ç–∏ –∑ [claude.ai/account](https://claude.ai/account)  
3. **Telegram User ID** - –æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º–∞—Ç–∏ –≤—ñ–¥ [@userinfobot](https://t.me/userinfobot)

## üîß –†–µ–∂–∏–º–∏ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏:

- `USE_SDK=false` - –í–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤—É—î Claude CLI (—Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–æ –¥–ª—è —Å—Ç–∞–±—ñ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—ñ)
- `USE_SDK=true` - –í–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤—É—î Python SDK (—à–≤–∏–¥—à–µ, –∞–ª–µ –º–µ–Ω—à —Å—Ç–∞–±—ñ–ª—å–Ω–æ)

## üìÇ –¶—ñ–ª—å–æ–≤–∞ –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ—è

# Create entrypoint script with automatic Claude CLI authentication
RUN echo '#!/bin/bash\n\
set -e\n\
\n\
echo "üöÄ Starting Claude Code Telegram Bot..."\n\
\n\
# Create Claude CLI directory structure\n\
mkdir -p ~/.claude/plugins/repos\n\
\n\
# Auto-authenticate Claude CLI if ANTHROPIC_API_KEY is provided\n\
if [ -n "$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY" ]; then\n\
    echo "üîê Configuring Claude CLI authentication..."\n\
    \n\
    # Create config.json with API key\n\
    cat > ~/.claude/config.json << EOF\n\
{\n\
    "apiKey": "$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY",\n\
    "settings": {\n\
        "defaultModel": "${CLAUDE_MODEL:-claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022}"\n\
    }\n\
}\n\
EOF\n\
    \n\
    echo "‚úÖ Claude CLI authenticated successfully"\n\
else\n\
    echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY not provided - using SDK mode"\n\
fi\n\
\n\
echo "üéØ Starting application..."\n\
exec python -m src.main "$@"\n' > /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh \
    && chmod +x /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh
input.new_string:
# Copy local Claude CLI authentication (must be provided during build)
# This directory should be copied from host ~/.claude during docker build
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} .claude/ /home/${USERNAME}/.claude/

# Create simple entrypoint script
RUN echo '#!/bin/bash\n\
set -e\n\
\n\
echo "üöÄ Starting Claude Code Telegram Bot..."\n\
\n\
# Ensure Claude CLI directory has proper permissions\n\
chmod -R 600 ~/.claude/ 2>/dev/null || true\n\
mkdir -p ~/.claude/plugins/repos\n\
\n\
# Verify Claude CLI authentication\n\
if [ -f ~/.claude/config.json ]; then\n\
    echo "‚úÖ Claude CLI authentication found"\n\
else\n\
    echo "‚ùå Claude CLI authentication missing - copy your ~/.claude to ./.claude/ and rebuild"\n\
    exit 1\n\
fi\n\
\n\
echo "üéØ Starting application..."\n\
exec python -m src.main "$@"\n' > /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh \
    && chmod +x /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh

toolUseResult.originalFile:
# Production-ready Dockerfile for Claude Telegram Bot
# Built for remote server deployment with user: kroschu
# Image: kroschu/claude-code-telegram:latest

FROM python:3.11-slim

# Build arguments for flexibility
ARG USER_UID=1000
ARG USER_GID=1000
ARG USERNAME=claudebot

# Install system dependencies including Node.js for Claude CLI
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    curl \
    git \
    jq \
    gcc \
    g++ \
    ca-certificates \
    gnupg \
    && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg \
    && echo "deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg] https://deb.nodesource.com/node_20.x nodistro main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nodesource.list \
    && apt-get update \
    && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends nodejs \
    && apt-get clean \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
    && rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/*

# Create non-root user with consistent UID/GID for volume mounting
RUN groupadd -g ${USER_GID} ${USERNAME} \
    && useradd -m -u ${USER_UID} -g ${USER_GID} -s /bin/bash ${USERNAME}

# Create application and data directories with proper ownership
RUN mkdir -p /app/data /app/target_project \
    && chown -R ${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} /app

# Set environment variables
ENV HOME=/home/${USERNAME}
ENV PATH="/home/${USERNAME}/.local/bin:$PATH"
ENV PYTHONPATH=/app
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
ENV PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1
ENV TZ=Europe/Kiev

# Switch to non-root user
USER ${USERNAME}
WORKDIR /home/${USERNAME}

# Install Poetry
RUN curl -sSL https://install.python-poetry.org | python3 -
ENV PATH="/home/${USERNAME}/.local/bin:${PATH}"

# Copy dependency files for Poetry
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} pyproject.toml poetry.lock README.md ./

# Configure Poetry and install Python dependencies
RUN poetry config virtualenvs.create false \
    && poetry config virtualenvs.in-project false \
    && poetry install --only=main --no-root --no-cache

# Install Claude CLI and create necessary directories
RUN mkdir -p ~/.local/bin ~/.claude/plugins/repos \
    && npm install @anthropic-ai/claude-code \
    && ln -s "$(pwd)/node_modules/.bin/claude" ~/.local/bin/claude

# Copy application code to /app
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} src/ /app/src/
COPY --chown=${USERNAME}:${USERNAME} CLAUDE.md /app/

# Set working directory to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Create entrypoint script with automatic Claude CLI authentication
RUN echo '#!/bin/bash\n\
set -e\n\
\n\
echo "üöÄ Starting Claude Code Telegram Bot..."\n\
\n\
# Create Claude CLI directory structure\n\
mkdir -p ~/.claude/plugins/repos\n\
\n\
# Auto-authenticate Claude CLI if ANTHROPIC_API_KEY is provided\n\
if [ -n "$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY" ]; then\n\
    echo "üîê Configuring Claude CLI authentication..."\n\
    \n\
    # Create config.json with API key\n\
    cat > ~/.claude/config.json << EOF\n\
{\n\
    "apiKey": "$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY",\n\
    "settings": {\n\
        "defaultModel": "${CLAUDE_MODEL:-claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022}"\n\
    }\n\
}\n\
EOF\n\
    \n\
    echo "‚úÖ Claude CLI authenticated successfully"\n\
else\n\
    echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY not provided - using SDK mode"\n\
fi\n\
\n\
echo "üéØ Starting application..."\n\
exec python -m src.main "$@"\n' > /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh \
    && chmod +x /home/${USERNAME}/entrypoint.sh

# Health check with comprehensive validation
HEALTHCHECK --interval=60s --timeout=15s --start-period=45s --retries=3 \
    CMD python -c "try: import src.main; from src.config.settings import Settings; Settings(); print('‚úì Health check passed'); exit(0)\nexcept Exception as e: print(f'‚úó Health check failed: {e}'); exit(1)"

# Labels for container management
LABEL maintainer="kroschu" \
      version="1.0.4-standalone" \
      description="Claude Code Telegram Bot - Remote access to Claude CLI via Telegram" \
      org.label-schema.vcs-url="https://github.com/maxfraieho/claude-notifer-and-bot"

# Default command with authentication setup
ENTRYPOINT ["/home/claudebot/entrypoint.sh"]

### 1. –ö–æ–ø—ñ—é–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è Claude CLI –∞—É—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ—ñ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—ó

### 2. –ù–∞–ª–∞—à—Ç—É–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è `.env` —Ñ–∞–π–ª—É

–í—ñ–¥—Ä–µ–¥–∞–≥—É–π—Ç–µ `.env` —Ñ–∞–π–ª:

```bash

```

### 3. –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫

## üîÑ –û–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—è –∞—É—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ—ñ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—ó
